org.ServerGui.Controller

Class AssignPlayersSceneController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ServerGui.Controller.AbstractSceneController
      • org.ServerGui.Controller.AssignPlayersSceneController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class AssignPlayersSceneController
extends AbstractSceneController

    When the host starts a game players and spectators need to be assigned via the AssignPlayer scene. This class implements the specific controller for AssignPlayer. Every Scene created needs its own Controller for its GUI.
